description: Domain Structure Collaborators Are Ordered By Likely Call Chain

do.description: Order collaborators to show the sequence of interactions
content: Order collaborators to show the sequence of interactions
Correct: Bot Tool: Moves To Next Action If Done: Workflow, Agile Bot, Project, Workflow State
Shows call chain: Bot Tool → Workflow → Agile Bot → Project → Workflow State
First collaborator is typically the direct interaction, subsequent ones show the chain
Correct: Behavior Tool: Runs Active Action On Behavior: Agile Bot, Project, Project Bot State, Workflow State, Bot Behavior, Bot Action
Call chain order helps understand the flow of responsibility
Correct: Agile Bot: Loads Workflow: Workflow, Bot Config

dont.description: Don't order collaborators alphabetically or randomly
content: Don't order collaborators alphabetically or randomly
Wrong: Bot Tool: Moves To Next Action: Agile Bot, Project, Workflow, Workflow State
If call chain is Workflow → Agile Bot → Project → Workflow State, order should reflect that
Don't mix up the sequence - first collaborator is the direct call, not the end of the chain
Wrong: Bot Tool: Moves To Next Action: Workflow State, Project, Agile Bot, Workflow
Should start with direct interaction, not the final state
